basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Gayle A Kearns Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Gayle Kearns Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Adult Education. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student majoring in Adult Education in the Department of Occupational & Technology Education 3.0 GPA or higher Enrolled in 3 credit hours or more Oklahoma resident Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
